import {useState, Button} from 'react' function Login () { const [showError, setShowError] = useState(false) const [changeForm, setchangeForm] = useState('Login') let handleSubmitLogin = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let username = e.target.username.value let password = e.target.password.value console.log(username + ' ' + password) } let handleSubmitSignup = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } let loginForm = () => { return (

Username or Email:



Password







Forgot your password?







Don't have an account? Sign up!

) } let signupForm = () => { return (

Get Ready To Experience A Whole New Shopping Experience!

Name

Age

Email

Password

Have an account? Sign in!

) } return (

Login Or Signup



{signupForm()}
) } export default Login
